author: Stereogum
title: Grammys 2017: Watch Adele Restart Her George Michael Tribute Mid-Song
text: After opening up the Grammys with a performance of "Hello," Adele returned as the surprise performer in charge of the all-important George Michael tribute. She began singing "Fastlove" in front of a screen showing images of George Michael before abruptly stopping, swearing on live television, apologizing, and starting the song over. Fortunately, she nailed … More »
